pullRequest.title: withInstructions should be without path details
pullRequest.bodyText: @easbar do you know why we include the average_speed path details for instructions in Measurement?

commit.message: measurement: withInstructions should be without path details

nodes.bodyText: This indeed looks strange. We are enabling instructions by enabling path details?
Here we enable simplify by adding path details? Do we still have a measurement with instructions and path details?
